description: Create a Lehman Roberts Apex Viewpoint ticket export

flags.name: --template-name
flags.validation: Must be one of lrJWSCash, lrJWSCrdt, lrTicketsV.

flags.name: --sale-date-max
flags.validation: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format; must be greater than or equal to sale-date-min.

flags.description: Location IDs to include (comma-separated or repeated)
flags.name: --location-ids

flags.description: Omit the header row in the CSV
flags.name: --omit-header-row

permissions: Allowed if the user is an admin; or if all material suppliers on the export are managed by the user; or if the user is a manager member of the broker.
side_effects: Creates a ticket export and generates CSV output; generation executes a database query to build the export.
validation_notes: template-name must be one of lrJWSCash, lrJWSCrdt, lrTicketsV; sale-date-min and sale-date-max are required and parsed as dates; sale-date-max must be greater than or equal to sale-date-min; location-ids defaults to an empty list when omitted; omit-header-row is an optional boolean.
